characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Roll a D6 each time a <CLAN> INFANTRY or <CLAN> BIKER unit loses a wound whilst within 3" of any friendly <CLAN> PAINBOYZ.  On a 6, that unit does not lose that wound. In addition, at the end of your Movement phase, a Painboy can attempt to heal a single <CLAN> INFANTRY or <CLAN> BIKER model within 1". Roll a D6; on a 1, the model you were attempting to heal loses a wound, but on any other result that model regains D3 wounds lost earlier in the battle.  You can only make one attempt to heal a given model with the Dok's Tools or Biker Dok's Tools ability in each turn.
